title: Amaranthine Voyage 5: The Orb of Purity CE (2015) PC [FINAL]
description:
============================================
Amaranthine Voyage 5: The Orb of Purity CE (2015) PC [FINAL]
============================================

- ENG

============================================
Description:                               =
============================================

From EIPIX, the studio that created Final Cut and Sea of Lies, invites you to explore a new world in the next Amaranthine Voyage! Professor Samantha Bennett has made a huge breakthrough in her harmonium research, but is shocked when a man from another world falls through her new portal. The man calls himself Kraixx and appears to be ill, pleading with Prof. Bennett to save his world. Since you're the leading expert on harmonium, Prof. Bennett calls you in, hoping you can save this strange man's life and uncover the mysteries of the dark harmonium threatening to swallow Kraixx's world. Search this new world for clues, but beware the Watchers, a cold-hearted group whose goal is to arrest anyone with magical abilities, including Kraixx. You'll have to decide who to trust in this new world where anything is possible.

============================================
CE FEATURES:                               =
============================================

Foil a kidnapper in the bonus game
Find collectible owls and hidden souvenirs!
Comprehensive Strategy Guide and special achievements
Wallpapers, concept art, soundtrack, and more!

============================================
Instructions:                              =
============================================

* Install                                         ^_^
* Play
